channel.title: Good msn spammer

item.title: Good msn spammer
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“Bego, post:1, topic:8347”]Well, scripts that use sendkeys are laggy and unefficient, as I noticed, so I decided to use my own method.

CTRL + V please. It is much faster and kicking someone off MSN is a breeze when you do bats.

Just turn off your emotions, cram as many :[ onto your clipboard as possible, set the times to spam and let er reek havoc upon your enemies.

[code]///Have what you want to spam on your clipboard
///You will have 3 seconds to get to the person
///Use tons of bats if you want to super lag them

program MSN_Spammer;

const
times = 120; //Put the number of bats you want to spam them with

var
i: integer;
begin
Writeln(‘3 seconds’);
Wait(3000);
repeat
KeyDown(17);
Wait(1);
KeyDown(86);
Wait(1);
KeyUp(17);
KeyUp(86);
Sendkeys(chr(13));
i := i + 1;
Writeln(‘Spammed ’ + inttostr(i) + ’ times.’);
until(i = times);
end.[/code][/quote]

CAnt y[quote=“XxKanexX, post:2, topic:8347”]Take out the writeln thing, Because it’s a long message and once you fill the debug box up an efficent amount it will start to lag a bit and go slower.

Made my own, Bordom:

[code]
//Copy Something, Select the Msn Window.

Const Times = 20;

var i: Integer;
begin
ActivateClient;
Wait(1000);
repeat
SendKeysVB(’^’ + ‘v’ + Chr(13), true);
Wait(1);
i:= i + 1;
until(i >= Times);
end.
[/code][/quote]
cant it just be cleardebug; befor it does writeln??? this would make more sense??

Read full topic

item.title: Good msn spammer
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Take out the writeln thing, Because it’s a long message and once you fill the debug box up an efficent amount it will start to lag a bit and go slower.

Made my own, Bordom:

//Copy Something, Select the Msn Window.

Const Times = 20;

var i: Integer;
begin
  ActivateClient;
  Wait(1000);
  repeat
    SendKeysVB('^' + 'v' + Chr(13), true);
    Wait(1);
    i:= i + 1;
  until(i >= Times);
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Good msn spammer
item.dc:creator: @Bego Bego
item.description:
@Bego wrote:

Well, scripts that use sendkeys are laggy and unefficient, as I noticed, so I decided to use my own method.

CTRL + V please. It is much faster and kicking someone off MSN is a breeze when you do bats.

Just turn off your emotions, cram as many :[ onto your clipboard as possible, set the times to spam and let er reek havoc upon your enemies.

[code]///Have what you want to spam on your clipboard
///You will have 3 seconds to get to the person
///Use tons of bats if you want to super lag them

program MSN_Spammer;

const
times = 120; //Put the number of bats you want to spam them with

var
i: integer;
begin
Writeln(‘3 seconds’);
Wait(3000);
repeat
KeyDown(17);
Wait(1);
KeyDown(86);
Wait(1);
KeyUp(17);
KeyUp(86);
Sendkeys(chr(13));
i := i + 1;
Writeln(‘Spammed ’ + inttostr(i) + ’ times.’);
until(i = times);
end.[/code]
